import React from 'react' import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import '../App.css' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' const ContactCard = ({ contact, user }) => { const handleDelete = () => { let config = { method: "DELETE", headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', } } fetch("http://localhost:9292/contacts/"+contact.id, ) } return (
Contact {contact.id} {contact.name}
  • Phone: {contact.phone_number}
  • Address: {contact.address}

    •
    ) } export default ContactCard
